capabilityDescription.en: Provides an Azure Blob Storage file resource for other components.
capabilityDescription.zh: Provides an Azure Blob Storage file resource for other components.

en.description: The full name of the blob
Controller Service used to obtain Azure Blob Storage Credentials.

zh.description: 用于获取Azure Blob存储凭据的控制器服务。

en.description: Name of the Azure storage container. In case of PutAzureBlobStorage processor, container can be created if it does not exist.

zh.description: Azure存储容器的名称。对于PutAzureBlobStorage处理器，如果容器不存在，则可以创建容器。
